page.title: 17HOME LIFE PETS
page.content: I'm Susan. I have two Jack Russell {dogs,}Jess and Ben. I like taking them for walks. I have two{fish,}Goldie and Fred, which are kept in a fish tank in the kitchen. I have three{cats,}Pip, Fluff and Whiskey, who sleep outside in a basket each but protected from the rain. I'm Laura. I have two adopted{cats, Lucky and Tinkerbell.I feed them night and morning, with milk and liver. I'm Sarah. My cat's name is Tabbitha. She is a one year old tabby with white paws. Tabbi is affectionate with a comical character. I'm Kathryn. My{dog}is Sam, a four year old labrador with two specific markings, a white star on her chest, and a split left ear. We got her from the RSPCA. She had been ill-treated. The split ear resulted from a scissor cut.
